modName: craftable children clothes and linen wrap
summary:
HEARTHFIRE REQUIRED!!!!!!!
this lets you craft children's clothes from linen and some more ingredients, and linen wrap from straw (they didnt have flax straw, but let's pretend they're the same)
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES HEARTHFIRE!
this mod if for those proud skyrim parents out there that don't want to buy clothes from the jerks at radiant raiment, and want to make their own clothes for their kids.

you can craft linen wrap from straw under the tanning rack. 5 straw = 1 wrap. i didn't want to add a new item named flax straw, or a new plant called flax, or make linen craftable from tundra cotton cause that's just absurd!

also you can craft clothes for your daughter and/ or son: each clothes needs 1 linen wrap, a few leather strips, 5 tundra cotton, and some more ingredients to give it the color: example, boy's blue clothes requires the mentioned materials and 2 blue mountain flowers. red clothes require creep cluster, green requires grass pod from spiky grass, grey from void salts, and yellow from dragon's tongue, and 1 blue mountain flower for the blue pants/dress.
all craftable at tanning rack.

i really recommend you use this mod with dynamic things since it lets you harvest straw from hay piles all around skyrim. link here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32448/?

again this requires hearthfire.


version 2: i added a version using stroti's spinning wheel resource, where you can make the linen wraps from straw there. everything else is still made at a tanning rack. the spinning wheel itself is put in several locations throughout skyrim, mostly farm houses. also put some in houses i thought should have them, like radiant raiment, house gray-mane, etc.
- on a personal note, i am not proud of this "update." spinning wheels are not in skyrim lore, let alone viking lore. vikings used spindles and hand.... forget it. this is skyrim. they have frickin crossbows for talos' sake! vikings didnt use crossbows. yea forget it, just download and enjoy, i dun care anymore.
and no, i am not adding anything new to the game, or making new items craftable at the wheel, like sheep's wool or cotton or whatever. yes i know i could do something with the tundra cotton and goat hide in the game to make clothes, but honestly i tried implementing a loom in the game with my craftable clothes mod. THERE'S NO GOOD RESOURCE for the loom! if someone finds a resource for the loom, plz tell me, i really dont like how clothes are craftable at a tanning rack. IT'S A TANNING RACK! NOT A LOOM!

i mean this adds a spinning wheel , so why not add a loom too? well too bad! unless someone finds, or makes, a loom resource and tells me, we all gonna have to pretend that a tanning rack is a loom. >...<

credit goes to stroti for his spinning wheel resource.
author: paulhanna
